title: Fleetwood Mac - Discography & Solo works [FLAC] - Kitlope
description:
***SPECIAL NOTE FOR THE PIRATE BAY USERS***


Due to the size of each torrent (10.13 & 12.28 GB) or more likely the large number of files in each one The Pirate Bay would not accept (I kept getting an error) the .torrent when trying to upload. I also cannot post links here on TPB in the description as there is an auto censor. So download the 681 KB file and the info is in that small torrent to acquire the 2 Fleetwood Mac torrents. What is downloaded in that 681 kB torrent is some information about the torrent, links to other sites and the 2 .torrent files.

Audiochecker Log

ThereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s an audiocheck folder present as I ran audiochecker to validate how authentic these lossless albums were. IÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢m glad to report everything looks good although there is an obvious case of some false positives. I donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t understand why Tango in the Night results came up so poorly using Audiochecker as it was a rip by me using EAC. I then re-ripped Tango in the Night and checked it again with Audiochecker and the same crap results occured. I had a downloaded copy (with log file) of the album and checked that as well and it had, yet again, the same crap results. My rip of Mystery to Me is, according the Audiochecker, 100%. Same with Timespace: Best of Stevie Nicks and Stevie Nicks Soundstage Sessions.


So this just confirms my suspicions of Audiochecker occurring some false positives as I had figured in the past. I wouldnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t worry about it if some songs from an album have a MPEG possibility as long as most songs are CDDA then you know its good. YouÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re just going to have to trust me on Tango in the Night being authentic since most are MPEG according to Audiochecker.





A Big thanks goes out to Demonoid members Oneanight (oan), Wishyouwerehere, Markshan, Loc Blazer, ukras, HellraiserRG, danhigh7, Waynelap and TheFunNun for their Fleetwood Mac contributions. Another  thanks goes out to DLedin & Galemark who did the Buckingham Nicks vinyl rip. Guys, this sounds incredible! Great job and such a fantastic album. Another big thanks goes to the members ofwhere I downloaded many of the older studio albums and compilations. Many were in MonkeyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Audio (APE) format so I converted to FLAC. I know my ratio took a massive hit but give it some time and I can seed back what I took!


*Note: Some Folders you will notice 2 or even 3 cue files. I left all the cue files in the torrent, the ones that say "cue_cutter" are the new cue files when I converted an ape to flac or had to split the tracks from one large FLAC. Look for these "cutter cues" if your planning to reconvert them in any which way.






Please help seed these FLACs! 




Enjoy this torrent :)



Kitlope
